meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a doll.
meanings.sent1: Her dollishness was evident in the way she moved gracefully and delicately.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's dollishness made her the perfect model for the toy store's advertisement.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, her dollishness stood out among the superheroes and pirates.
meanings.sent4: The dollishness of the antique figurine captured the attention of collectors worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The actress's dollishness on stage enchanted the audience.

meanings.definition: The appearance or behavior of a doll.
meanings.sent1: The dollishness of the mannequin made it look almost lifelike.
meanings.sent2: Her dollishness in the play brought the character to life on stage.
meanings.sent3: The dollishness of the robot toy amused the children at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The dollishness of the puppet show characters charmed the young audience.
meanings.sent5: The dollishness of the porcelain doll made it a prized possession.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a doll.
meanings.sent1: The dollishness dress she wore had frills and lace, just like a doll's outfit.
meanings.sent2: His dollishness features, with rosy cheeks and glassy eyes, made him look like a toy come to life.
meanings.sent3: The dollishness decorations in the room gave it a whimsical and playful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The dollishness appearance of the cake with its miniature figurines was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The dollishness voice of the ventriloquist dummy added to the eerie atmosphere of the show.
